characters: Two cyclists on the right side of the road, a silver van on the left side of the road.
summary: The vehicle is driving on a city street. There are two cyclists on the right side of the road riding in the same direction as the vehicle. A silver van is on the left side of the road, moving in the opposite direction. The cyclists are maintaining their position on the right side of the road, and the van is staying in its lane on the left.
actions: The vehicle is maintaining a steady speed and direction, following the road. The driver is likely monitoring the cyclists on the right and the oncoming van on the left, ensuring a safe distance is maintained from both.
